shape_2_per_frame2=//b = b + 0.3*(0.6*sin(time*1.3434) + 0.4*sin(1.78*time));

shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.000
per_frame_1=bass_thresh = above(bass_att,bass_thresh)*2 + (1-above(bass_att,bass_thresh))*((bass_thresh-1.3)*0.91+1.3);
per_frame_2=
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=q2=bass_thresh;
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=vol=(bass+mid+treb)*0.25;
per_frame_8=vol=vol*vol;
per_frame_9=q3=vol;
per_frame_10=
per_frame_11=q4 = min(vol*0.5, 1);
per_frame_12=dy = -0.005;
per_frame_13=warp= 0.0215+.006*mid;
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=sx = 1.003;
per_pixel_1=dx1=(cos(y*q3*30)*1.2)*0.11;
per_pixel_2=
per_pixel_3=dx=if(above(y,0.8),if(below(y,0.83),if(above(x,0.05),if(below(x,0.93),(dx1*(1-rad+0.1))*1.5,0),0),0),0);
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=q1=dx;
per_pixel_6=
per_pixel_7=sx = 1+0.0075*y*(bass-.25*treb);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`
warp_5=`    float3 rc = pow(GetBlur1(frac(uv))-0.05, GetPixel(frac(uv))-0.9);
warp_6=`    float2 ruv = frac(frac(float2(uv.x, uv.y-pow(rc.x,0.007))));
warp_7=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, frac(float2(ruv.x, ruv.y))).xyz;
warp_8=`    ret += 0.001;
warp_9=`    ret *= 1; 
warp_10=`    
warp_11=`
warp_12=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`//based on Geiss' bas relief shader, modified by stahlregen
comp_5=`
comp_6=`    float2 uv2;
comp_7=`
comp_8=`    float4 c = float4(1,0.4,0.15,0.1);
comp_9=`
comp_10=`    uv2 = uv + float2(1,0)*texsize.zw;
comp_11=`    float gx1 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_12=`    uv2 = uv + float2(-1,0)*texsize.zw;
comp_13=`    float gx2 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_14=`
comp_15=`    uv2 = uv + float2(0,1)*texsize.zw;
comp_16=`    float gy1 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_17=`    uv2 = uv + float2(0,-1)*texsize.zw;
comp_18=`    float gy2 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_19=`
comp_20=`    float3 g = normalize(float3(gx1-gx2, gy1-gy2, 0.14));
comp_21=`
comp_22=`    ret = 0.5 + 0.5*g;
comp_23=`    ret *= saturate(length(ret.xy-0.5)*5);
comp_24=`    ret = ret.xxy;
comp_25=`    ret += 1;
comp_26=`    float3 what = lerp(ret,ret*(GetBlur3(uv)-GetBlur1(uv)),pow(hue_shader,ret));
comp_27=`    ret *=what;
comp_28=`    ret *= hue_shader;
comp_29=`
comp_30=`    //ret *= 1.5; //old gamma effect    
comp_31=`}
